# Ferrous and Non-Ferrous Metals Tender Notice

## Background
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSCP) has a requirement for the supply and delivery of ferrous and non-ferrous metal products to various federal government departments across the provinces of Nova Scotia, New Brunswick, Prince Edward Island, and Newfoundland and Labrador.

## Solicitation Details
- **Reference Number**: PW_HAL_502_11562
- **Solicitation Number**: E6HAL_210003/A
- **Publication Date**: August 22, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date**: September 20, 2022, 1:00 PM
- **Trade Agreements**: CETA/WTO-AGP/CPTPP/CFTA/FTAs with Peru/Colombia/Panama/Korea/UK

## Tender Description
The procurement is governed by the Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement: No. The nature of requirements includes the supply and delivery of ferrous and non-ferrous metal products. The tender will be for a two (2) year initial period with three (3) one-year optional periods.

## Specified Goods and Services
The required goods and services include:

- GSIN # N9510 & N9530

## Contact Information
For inquiries, please contact:

- Richard Parsons, Contracting Authority
- Email: [richard.parsons@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca](mailto:richard.parsons@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca)
- Telephone: (902) 399-8427
- Fax: (902) 496-5016

All inquiries must be made in writing and should be received no less than five (5) calendar days prior to the closing date to allow sufficient time to respond.

## Submissions
Submissions may be made electronically using the CPC Connect service provided by Canada Post Corporation. For more information, refer to Part 2 of the solicitation, "Offeror Instructions," and Part 3, "Offer Preparation Instructions."

## Language of Submission
Documents may be submitted in either English or French.

## Important Notes
- The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
- Delivery Date: As mentioned above.
